text: Niceto Alcalá-Zamora y Torres (6 July 1877 – 18 February 1949) was a Spanish lawyer and politician. He was the first prime minister of the Second Spanish Republic, and the president from 1931 to 1936. Category:1877 births Category:1949 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Spain Category:Presidents of Spain
title: Niceto Alcalá-Zamora
